main event: An unidentified flying object was observed visually in the air near Cathedral City, California on December 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, sharply outlined, solid, black object that appeared to be wobbling rapidly and making a sound.
The object disappeared to the southeast.
Pilots of an aircraft flying over the area reported observing a large unidentified aerial object maneuvering at a high rate of speed near their plane.

Several individuals observed 4 UFOs in the sky over Cathedral City, California on the evening of November 2, 1957. The objects were described as large, brilliantly lighted, and moving swiftly from east to west.

An F-86 jet fighter made visual contact with one of the unidentified lights (UFO) approximately 40 miles east of Cathedral City, California. The pilot reported that he approached the unidentified light and it accelerated rapidly and disappeared from his sight.
sighted object: a bright, sharply outlined, solid, black object; large unidentified aerial objects; 4 UFOs
